President Trump: s statement that China should have informed the United States three months earlier about the coronavirus outbreak was deemed inaccurate and misleading by the expert.
The symptoms of the virus did not emerge: and China alerted the World Health Organization on December 31, suggesting that the U.S. government was aware of the virus by early January.
Dr: Anthony Fauci, a key figure in the coronavirus crisis, stated that Trump's claim of three months earlier would mean September, which contradicts the timeline of the virus's emergence.
The travel restrictions imposed on China: indicating that the U.S. government took action promptly upon becoming aware of the virus.
